page.title: 10Epworth's Secondary School.
page.content: South Axholme is our comprehensive school and it is attended by 900 pupils. It has a three storey main building,a separate south block, and many other out buildings. There are many different mixed ability classes in the first year, named after important local people such as Wesley, Franklin, Herewood, Newton and Tennyson. After the first year children are put into sets of similar ability for their working groups. Children come to South Axholme from all the villages in the southern part of the Isle of Axholme. They spend five years at South Axholme after when they usually go on to John Leggot sixth form college or North Lindsey Technical College in Scunthorpe if they want to continue their Education.
